parameters.name: AutoBind
parameters.description:
Enable automatic binding for new assets. Values:

- **0**: Off
- **1**: On

parameters.name: AutoBindVersion
parameters.description:
Version to automatically bind when adding new assets. Values:
- **1**: Basic Edition 
- **3**: Enterprise Edition
- **5**: Advanced Edition
- **6**: Antivirus Edition    
- **7**: Container Edition

parameters.name: UpdateIfNecessary
parameters.description: Whether to force upgrade the version.
